paymentMethod1Desc: For your convenience, we will send you a personalized payment link. Pay easily with a credit card (Visa, Mastercard), debit card (PSE), or directly from Bancolombia or Nequi. It's a simple and completely protected process.
paymentMethod2Desc: If you prefer, you can make a direct transfer to our Bold savings account. We will provide you with the bank details upon confirming your reservation. Simple and direct to secure your adventure.
